string.value: #m260000000#, a town built in the middle of the desert. This town feels different from anything else you've ever experienced. Why are the people in #m260000000# so aloof? You hear #b#p2101005##k is researching at #m260000000#. Ask him for help.

#p2101005# tells you the people in #m260000000# are very guarded, and that the best way to break the ice is by drinking their water from the oasis. Then they'll accept you. You should head over to the #boasis near the palace#k.

You returned to #p2101005# after drinking the water and he told you the people of #m260000000# should accept you now. He also explained the basic happenings in #m260000000#. #m260000000# seems a bit complex. Be careful.

Hey, you are not from #m260000000#. Huh? How did I know? Come on, it's obvious! You don't look like someone from the desert, no offense. I'm sure you've noticed by now that the people of #m260000000# don't say a word to you...\r\n#L0##bAre the people of #m260000000# really that mean?#l

Nah, they are just extra careful around outsiders. These residents, having spent all their lives in the desert, don't really open up to strangers. It'll take some time for you to get adjusted to this place. \r\n#L0##bWhat can I do to talk to these people?#l
All you have to do is to become a citizen of #m260000000#. I'll tell you how. Are you sure you want to become a citizen?
It's easy! In the center of town, near #m260000300#, you'll find a huge oasis. Drink water from there, and the residents'll accept you.
Hmmm. Afraid to embrace a new culture? I understand it's hard to adapt, but just try it!
Hey, you drank the water! It's very important for the people of #m260000000# that you drink the water from the oasis. It means you're willing to be one of them, a rite of passage, so to speak.

Now you can start conversations with the people here. Be careful, though. The general mood around #m260000000# isn't very good these days. People are angered over the #bpowerless Sultan and the ever-greedy Queen#k.
I advise you to go to the oasis and drink from it, if you want to be accepted the by the townspeople.
